thread.title: abishek
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by abishek

author: abishek
title: abishek
text: I ordered two jackets for size and there was some confusion about the correct jackets. I dealt with the Customer Services team through the chat service online and everyone of them were really helpful in communicating with me through ordering, answering queries about my order, dealing with returns and the refund. They'll be the first who I'll go to for my bext purchase and would not hesitate in recommending them. On top of that all, best prices online.
